p: Table 2 presents the physical properties of CMC‐G film formulae. G significantly decreased transparency and increased WS ( p < .05). F5 (CMC: G (5:0)) had the highest transparency and lowest WS because of having the lowest level of G compared with the other formulae ( p < .05), which is due to the nature of the yellowish color of G as described by Ramos et al. ( 2012).
